nodes.text: Joron Tal'vor was a male captain in the Republic Navy during the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. In 3671 BBY, Tal'vor married a Republic Army officer named Elin Garza, becoming her second husband, but he was killed shortly afterwards while defending the Seswenna sector from an Imperial offensive.
Joron Tal'vor was first mentioned in Elin Garza's bio entry in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
